summary: A collection of helper utilities that aid the media library in maintaining data integrity and consistency. It includes tools for identifying and merging duplicate media entries, detecting file encodings, tracking missing or moved files, monitoring directory changes to refresh metadata, cleaning textual data, and normalizing web URLs.
business_intent: Ensure the media management system remains accurate, up‑to‑date, and user‑friendly by automatically handling common file‑system issues and simplifying data processing tasks.
